tool_description: Retrieves current stock levels for products from specified warehouses or all available locations with real-time accuracy.

product_id.description: Product ID to check stock levels for

warehouse_ids.description: Specific warehouse IDs to check, or null for all warehouses

include_reserved.description: Include reserved stock in the count

include_damaged.description: Include damaged/unsellable stock in the count

error_messages: Product not found: The specified product_id does not exist in inventory system
Warehouse not found: One or more warehouse_ids are invalid or inaccessible
Real-time data unavailable: Stock data is temporarily unavailable, try again shortly
Excessive warehouse count: Maximum 50 warehouses can be queried simultaneously
usage: Provide a product_id and optionally specify warehouse_ids array. Use include_reserved and include_damaged flags to control what stock counts are included.

product_id.description: The product ID that was checked

total_available.description: Total available stock across all specified locations

last_updated.description: ISO 8601 timestamp of last stock update
